svg.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; inset: 0px; transform-origin: center center;

textPath.style: font-family: 'Public Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: 0em; line-height: 1em; word-spacing: 7px; fill: black;

text.textPath: ✦ SCROLL DOWN ✦ AND KNOW ME BETTER
